Publishing an npm Package

Step 1: Create a package.json file

To publish a package, you need to have a package.json file in your project directory. You can create one by running:

npm init

Step 2: Write your package code

Write the code for your package in a file, usually index.js. This file should export the functionality of your package.

Step 3: Test your package

Test your package locally by running:

npm link

Step 4: Create an npm account

If you don't have an npm account, create one by running:

npm adduser

Step 5: Publish your package

To publish your package, run:

npm publish
